name: Table Party
summary:
Hello our Mates! Welcome to the Boardgame World✨
Join the ultimate gaming experience with Table Party! 

Bring your friends and family together for laughter and fun, or play solo with our engaging AI. Dive into a growing collection of tabletop and casual games, all set in beautifully detailed interactive environments. Enjoy friendly competition, share unforgettable moments, and let the good times roll!

Games include:
Yacht Dice 🎲
Othello ⚪
Chess ♟️
Checkers ⚫
Rummy ♦️
Gin Rummy ♣️
Yut Nori 🥢
Omok...
